00010 #ifndef BIT_H
00011 #define BIT_H
00012 
00013 #include <inttypes.h>
00014 
00015 #define BIT(x)          (1 << (x))
00016 #define BIT_32(x)    ((uint32_t)1 << (x))
00017 
00018 #define bit_set_8(var, mask)                 ((var) |= (uint8_t)(mask))
00019 #define bit_clear_8(var, mask)               ((var) &= (uint8_t)~(mask))
00020 #define bit_toggle_8(var, mask)              ((var) ^= (uint8_t)(mask))
00021 #define bit_read_8(var, mask)                ((var) & (uint8_t)(mask))
00022 #define bit_write_8(cond, var, mask)         ((cond) ? bit_set_8(var, mask) : bit_clear_8(var, mask))
00023 #define bit_is_set_8(var, bit)               bit_read_8(var, BIT(bit))
00024 #define bit_is_clear_8(var, bit)             (!bit_read_8(var, BIT(bit)))
00025 #define loop_until_bit_is_set_8(var, bit)    do{}while(bit_is_clear_8(var, bit))
00026 #define loop_until_bit_is_clear_8(var, bit)  do{}while(bit_is_set_8(var, bit))
00027 
00028 
00029 #define bit_set_16(var, mask)                 ((var) |= (uint16_t)(mask))
00030 #define bit_clear_16(var, mask)               ((var) &= (uint16_t)~(mask))
00031 #define bit_toggle_16(var, mask)              ((var) ^= (uint16_t)(mask))
00032 #define bit_read_16(var, mask)                ((var) & (uint16_t)(mask))
00033 #define bit_write_16(cond, var, mask)         ((cond) ? bit_set_16(var, mask) : bit_clear_16(var, mask))
00034 #define bit_is_set_16(var, bit)               ((var) & (uint16_t)BIT(bit))
00035 #define bit_is_clear_16(var, bit)             (!bit_is_set_16(var, bit))
00036 #define loop_until_bit_is_set_16(var, bit)    do{}while(bit_is_clear_16(var, bit))
00037 #define loop_until_bit_is_clear_16(var, bit)  do{}while(bit_is_set_16(var, bit))
00038 
00039 
00040 #define bit_set_32(var, mask)                ((var) |= (uint32_t)(mask))
00041 #define bit_clear_32(var, mask)              ((var) &= (uint32_t)~(mask))
00042 #define bit_toggle_32(var, mask)             ((var) ^= (uint32_t)(mask))
00043 #define bit_read_32(var, mask)               ((var) & (uint32_t)(mask))
00044 #define bit_write_32(cond, var, mask)        ((cond) ? bit_set_32(var, mask) : bit_clear_32(var, mask))
00045 #define bit_is_set_32(var, bit)              ((var) & (uint32_t)BIT_32(bit))
00046 #define bit_is_clear_32(var, bit)            (!bit_is_set_32(var, bit))
00047 #define loop_until_bit_is_set_32(var, bit)   do{}while(bit_is_clear_32(var, bit))
00048 #define loop_until_bit_is_clear_32(var, bit) do{}while(bit_is_set_32(var, bit))
00049 
00050 
00051 #define bit_set(var, mask)                      bit_set_8(var, mask)
00052 #define bit_clear(var, mask)                    bit_clear_8(var, mask)
00053 #define bit_toggle(var, mask)                   bit_toggle_8(var, mask)
00054 #define bit_read(var, mask)                     bit_read_8(var, mask)
00055 #define bit_write(cond, var, mask)              bit_write_8(cond, var, mask)
00056 #ifdef bit_is_set
00057     #undef bit_is_set
00058     #define bit_is_set(var, bit)                bit_is_set_8(var, bit)
00059 #endif
00060 #ifdef bit_is_clear
00061     #undef bit_is_clear
00062     #define bit_is_clear(var, bit)              bit_is_clear_8(var, bit)
00063 #endif
00064 #ifdef loop_until_bit_is_set
00065     #undef loop_until_bit_is_set
00066     #define loop_until_bit_is_set(var, bit)     loop_until_bit_is_set_8(var, bit)
00067 #endif
00068 #ifdef loop_until_bit_is_clear
00069     #undef loop_until_bit_is_clear
00070     #define loop_until_bit_is_clear(var, bit)   loop_until_bit_is_clear_8(var, bit)
00071 #endif
